channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Loungewear
channel.desc: Relax in style with our wonderful selection of loungewear. Wonderfully warm separates in cosy fabrics will help you to make the most of your downtime.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia
channel.desc: Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Apricot Clothing
channel.desc: Discover Apricot fashion, showcasing chic wardrobe staples and elegant pieces to bring your style to life. From fabulous prints to bold pops of colours, discover how you can enliven your look today.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Sleepwear
channel.desc: Update your nightwear with our fabulous selection from some top brands. From comfy pyjamas and soft, stylish nightdresses to slouchy robes and more, we've got you covered.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Rieker Footwear
channel.desc: Rieker offers footwear designed to be flexible, roomy, light and well cushioned. Following trends in the marketplace, Rieker provides classic footwear to women of all ages.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Diamonique Christmas Spectacular
channel.desc: A dazzling array of diamonique jewellery just in time for Christmas. Our celebration over five days features all the sparkling designs you could ever want.

channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.title: Seasalt Cornwall Fashion
channel.desc: Founded in Penzance, Cornwall in 1981, Seasalt offer high quality, functional and timelessly styling clothing to complement your wardrobe throughout the year.
